_header: Saint John the Gospeller says us / that til his disciples said
Note: For the Narratio (Mother of James and John) occurring separately see 4717.
_description: Gospel for the Fifth Sunday after Easter in the Northern Homily Cycle

BodAsh42.First Lines:
Saynte Ione þe gospellere saise vsþat to þe apostlis
                    saide iesus…
BodAsh42.Last Lines:
…Oure lorde gode to þat ioye vs ledeAnd wiþ þat
                    fulthe vs fill & ffede
BodAsh42.Editions:
Thompson,  Anne B.,
                        ed.  
             The Northern Homily
                    Cycle.
         Kalamazoo, MI: Western Michigan University for TEAMS, 2008.

BodEngPoeta1.First Lines:
Seint Ion þe gospilere seiþ vsÞat to his disciples
                    seide Ihesus…
BodEngPoeta1.Last Lines:
…Wher Ioye and murþe schal spredeAnd euere lyf and neuere
                    dede. AMEN.
BodEngPoeta1.Attributed Title: Amen dico vobis si quid pecieritis (f. 190vc)
BodEngPoeta1.Facsimiles:
Doyle,  I. A.,
                        ed.  
             The Vernon Manuscript. A Facsimile of Bodleian Library, Oxford, MS Eng.
                poet.a.1,
          with an introduction by A. I. Doyle. Cambridge: D. S. Brewer, 1987. 
Scase,  Wendy,  and  Nick Kennedy, eds.  
             A facsimile edition of the Vernon manuscript: Oxford, Bodleian Library, MS. Eng. Poet. A. 1.
         Oxford: The Bodleian Library, 2011.

BodLatMisB17.First Lines:
Saynt þe gospellere sais us Iohnþat tyll hys apostelles
                    said IhesusIf ȝhe in my name ask any thing…
BodLatMisB17.Note:
Corresponds to Oxford,  Bodleian Library Ashmole 42 (SC 6923), fol.
                        124v-125v; imperfect at end because just fragment; 29
                    x 2; worn and dirty with loss of text.
BodLatMisB17.Editions:
Nevanlinna,  S. 
             “A Note on the Robartes MS of the Northern Homily Collection.” 
             Neuphilologische Mitteilungen
         67 (1966): 58-66: 58-66.

CULAdd8335.First Lines:
SEynt Ione þe gospellere sais vsþat to þe apostles
                    saide ihesus…
CULAdd8335.Last Lines:
…Oure lorde to þat lande vs ledeAnd with þat fode vs
                    fille & fede
CULAdd8335.Attributed Title:
Dominica iiiia post octava pasche secundum Iohannem (p.
                    201)

CULDd11.First Lines:
SEynt Iohn þe Gospellere seyth vsþat to his disciplis
                    seyde ihesusif ȝe in my name…
CULDd11.Last Lines:
…& þat it may þus beAmen Amen sey alle
                    we
CULDd11.Attributed Title:
Secundum Iohannem. Amen dico vobis si quid pecieritis patrem in nomine
                        meo et cetera (f. 128v)

CULGg531.First Lines:
Saynt Iohn þe gospeler says vsþat tyll hys disciples sayd
                    ihesus…
CULGg531.Last Lines:
…Oure lorde vn to þat lande vs ledeAnd þat fude vs
                    fille and fede
CULGg531.Attributed Title:
þis es þe gospell of þe fyfte sonunday after pask day
                    (f. 84)

BLHar4196.First Lines: Þis godspell witnes wele till vsTo his apostels said ihesus…
BLHar4196.Last Lines: …Sune sal he grant ȝow ȝoure askingȜit asked ȝe noght in þe name of me…
BLHar4196.Note: Preceded by Latin, “Amen dico uobis Si quid & cetera”; incomplete at end due to missing folio between 93 and 94.
BLHar4196.Attributed Title: Dominica iiii post octava pasche Secundum Iohannem (rubric, f. 93vb)
BLHar4196.Editions:
Nevanlinna,  Sara. 
             The Northern Homily Cycle: The Expanded Version in MSS Harley 4196 and Cotton Tiberius E.vii.
             3 vols. 
             Memoires de la Societé Neophilologique de Helsinki.
         Helsinki. 38 (1972); 41 (1973); and 43 (1984): II.210
                    .

MinULZ822.First Lines:
Saynt Ion þe gospeller says vsþat tyll hys appostelles
                    sayde ihesus…
MinULZ822.Last Lines:
…oure lorde vs to þat londe ledeand wyth þat fode vs
                    fyll & fede
MinULZ822.Attributed Title:
Dominica quarta post octavas pasche Secundum Iohannem (f.
                        91v)
